SELECT reservation.reserve_seq AS regNo, user.name AS name, rentcar.price AS price, rentcar.img AS img, reservation.qty AS qty, reservation.dday AS dday, reservation.rday AS rday, reservation.usein AS usein, reservation.usewifi AS usewifi, reservation.useseat AS useseat, reservation.usenavi AS usenavi, (reservation.qty * reservation.dday * (rentcar.price + (reservation.usein + reservation.usewifi + reservation.useseat)*10000)) AS totalPrice, DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(reservation.rday, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL (reservation.dday - 1) DAY) AS endDate FROM reservation JOIN rentcar ON reservation.num = rentcar.num JOIN user ON reservation.userid = user.userid where reserve_seq=#{regNo};
mapper.update: update rentcar set name = #{name}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, usepeople = #{usepeople}, total_qty = #{totalQty}, company = #{company}, img = #{img}, info = #{info} where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rentcar(name, category, price, usepeople, total_qty, company, img, info) VALUES("${name}",${category},${price},${usepeople},${total_Qty},"${company}","${img}","${info}")
